name: Trek Bicycle Company
title: Web Technologies Architect
description: Led the development of the customer facing web sites. The framework I wrote powered their sites for six years.
responsibilities: Provide all support for a DSL order process written in PHP.
Managing a mass mail scheduler I wrote in Perl.
Worldship integration support for shipping DSL modems and parts.
Collecting business requirements for PHP and Perl software.
accomplishments: Built a framework that scaled from 5 to 30 localized contexts.
The shipping management software I designed went 7 years without needing significant attention.
learnings: I learned a lot about supporting software 'over time'. Things that seem to speed development now may slow it later.
My first exposure to handling real spikes was during the Tour de France airings.
I learned how to develop an SMS messaging applications.
reasonLeft: Things were too smooth, I had grown bored. I wanted to help a startup grow into something amazing.
